title: ICE on generic type inference failure for unboxed closures

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: E-needs-test
labels.description: Call for participation: writing correctness tests

body:
``` rust
#![feature(unboxed_closures)]

struct Foo<T>;

fn main() {
    let foo = Foo;
    let closure = |:| foo;
}
```

---

                          ^~~~~~~~~
error: internal compiler error: node_id_to_type: no type for node `local foo (id=15)`
